name: UNQI
description:
UNQI is a brand new strategy game where the goal is to be unique – players win points by choosing the smallest unique number. Careful though, if you are the largest unique number, you lose points! Compete against other players online to earn qoins, collect fancy items, and rise to the top of the ranks. Become a founding player of the fastest growing strategy game!

Features:
Online Play - Compete against other players online to increase your MMR, unlock special items, and improve your stats. This game features extensive stats tracking and leaderboard progression.

Offline Play - Compete against mathematically trained bots to perfect your UNQI strategy. A great game mode for farming qoins.

Item collection - Spend your qoins and collect all the items hand-drawn by the UNQI artist.

Game investment - Invest your qoins into the actions of real players online to win big!
